english: Where can I buy a ticket?

translit: Nan munkuttiye tikket pativu ceyya ventuma?
english: Do I need to book a ticket in advance?

tamil: எனக்கு ஒரு வழி / திரும்ப டிக்ெகட் கிைடக்குமா?
translit: Enakku oru vali/ tirumpa tikket kitaikkuma?
english: Can I have a one-way / return ticket, please?

translit: Nan 1am vakuppu/ 2am vakuppu tikkettaip pera mutiyuma … ?
Nan oru nal/ varantira tikket peralama?
english: Can I get a day / weekly ticket?

translit: Tikkettai rattu ceyya/ marra/ urutippatutta virumpukiren
english: I would like to cancel / change / confirm my ticket, please.
